nodes.text: Voran Stalton was an up-and-coming member of the Stalton Syndicate. The man became embroiled with a group of adventurers hired by the Committee for Renewal.
Voran Stalton is mentioned in an adaventure seed in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game sourcebook Dangerous Covenants.
If the players defeat the Synidcate, Stalton flees.
